text.div:
SARS Coronavirus 2 RNA, Qualitative

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    94309-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94500-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94565-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
    94660-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    94759-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    94819-0 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94822-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by Sequencing
    94845-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by NAA with probe detection
    95406-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Nose by NAA with probe detection
    95424-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Sequencing
